org.extremecomponents.table.handler
Class ColumnHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.extremecomponents.table.handler.ColumnHandler
public class ColumnHandler
extends Object

The first pass over the table just loads up the column properties. The properties will be loaded up and held here.

Author:
Jeff Johnston
